Class CircularBufferRoots

java.lang.Object
CircularBufferRoots
public class CircularBufferRoots
extends java.lang.Object
circular buffer class to get the solved roots from the slave threads and insert them into the master class

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private java.util.concurrent.ArrayBlockingQueue<java.lang.String[]> bufferRoots
    ArrayBlockingQueue to hold an array of strings with the root string values

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    CircularBufferRoots()
    no argument constructor that sets the capacity of the blocking buffer to 1, so it just holds the array with the roots

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.lang.String[] getRoots()
    method to get the roots array holding the solved roots as strings
    void putRoots​(java.lang.String x1, java.lang.String x2)
    method to place the root values into the buffer

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Field Details

    • bufferRoots

      private final java.util.concurrent.ArrayBlockingQueue<java.lang.String[]> bufferRoots
      ArrayBlockingQueue to hold an array of strings with the root string values

  • Constructor Details

    • CircularBufferRoots

      public CircularBufferRoots()
      no argument constructor that sets the capacity of the blocking buffer to 1, so it just holds the array with the roots

  • Method Details

    • putRoots

      public void putRoots​(java.lang.String x1, java.lang.String x2) throws java.lang.InterruptedException
      method to place the root values into the buffer
      Parameters:
      x1 - solved root 1
      x2 - solved toot 2
      Throws:
      java.lang.InterruptedException - when the put method from the blocking buffer throws an exception

    • getRoots

      public java.lang.String[] getRoots() throws java.lang.InterruptedException
      method to get the roots array holding the solved roots as strings
      Returns:
      the array with the solved roots as strings
      Throws:
      java.lang.InterruptedException - when the take method from the blocking buffer throws an exception
